ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This source/ seminar is a good way to be introduced to different fields of geology and geophysics and get acquainted with the different avenues of research in the same. It is not always easy to understand everything that is discussed in a seminar, but even hearing different technical terms or being introduced to new concepts is a good learning exercise. It made me more familiar with fields that I did not know much about. For me, this course served as a means to expose myself to ongoing research in different fields in geophysics and related controversies in the validity of their results. I did not know about most of those topics so it served as a good introduction to these new concepts. Moreover, listening to logical reasoning and discussion between people more knowledgeable than me was a very good experience from which I hope to learn a lot.
I would recommend this course to any geophysics student as it helps to polish your presenting skills and learn new material.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course gave me a wider breadth of knowledge and caused me to think about subjects which I usually don't consider (like paleoclimate and the faint young sun!).
